name: Bring them home !
description:
You are the Susuwatari's grandpa. All your naughty grandchildren have run away and can't find their way home. They are very scared and need a hug!

Fortunately for you : Susuwatari + Susuwatari = Big ball of Susuwatari !

You have to bring them to the flag, but beware of walls!

Commands :

  • Arrows : move grandpa
  • D and Q: rotate clockwise or anti-clockwise
  • R : refresh the current level
  • Compatible with a Gamepad, rotate with A and B, and refresh with X

Pre-made assets :

  • Two sets of tilemaps from Pixel Frog: "Kings and Pigs" and "Pirate Bombs".
  • A sound effect from 18hiltc
  • A sound track from Soundimage.org
